official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to take steps to cause the exportation, at competitive world prices, of basic agricultural commodities produced in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Agriculture and Food Act of 1981 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to take all feasible steps to cause the exportation at competitive world prices of basic agricultural commodities produced in the United States. Directs the Secretary to subsidize, if necessary, the price of exporting any basic agricultural commodity covered by a price support loan program. Limits the total value of such subsidy.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to take steps to cause the exportation, at competitive world prices, of basic agricultural commodities produced in the United States.
